Greetings to prime minister of Saint Lucia 
    Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Premier Hong Song Nam of the DPRK cabinet sent a message of greetings to Kenny Anthony,  prime minister of Saint Lucia, on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of its independence.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms in the new century, too, the message wished the people of Saint Lucia progress and prosperity.
